entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Malay Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Malay Falls 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Drizzle or rain showers changing to flurries overnight. Fog. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4 except minus 8 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 4 except minus 8 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
